Articles.Content:
Version 0.90.0 Beta

build id = 00705

2014-12-15_14-29-19

OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 (6.1.7601) 64bit

Quickload Bug: When quickloading even though no quicksave was made before, the game loads a (really Old?) Savegame. Which leeds to loosing all the Game progress between those 2 Savegames, as the Game autosaves immediately. So recent Savegame is erased.

Greetings M.

Hmm, weird. I tried this, both creating a new save from a fresh start, and creating a new save after doing a quick save in a previous game. I get this notice in the log file


[Log]: No save file found for path: C:/Games/KSP_win_0.90.0.705_Dev/KSP_Data/../saves/testgame/quicksave.sfs

Can you provide more details of what you are doing before you try the quickload? and also, are you using any mods?

Welcome to the forums.

Cheers,

~Claw

Edited December 30, 2014 by Claw
